Title: Adventure Lads IV
Text:
Merovech Hornwood has asked us to search Fornost for a possible hidden treasure in a maybe hidden chamber in the sewers below.

Search Fornost for possible entrances to the sewers below. He mentioned off-hand it would be marked by a skull on a tree, near a tower to the west of the entrance.
CompleteText: Youâ€™ve found the entrance!  Do you really want to go down there?
